moves.name: Air Slash
moves.effect: Has a moderate chance of making the target flinch.

moves.name: X Sp. Atk
moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s Sp. Atk.

moves.name: Tri Attack
moves.effect: Has a small chance of leaving the target burned, paralyzed, or frozen.

moves.name: Gift of Joy!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Speed and critical-hit rate. Sharply raises the Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, accuracy, or evasiveness of all allied sync pairs at random.

syncMove.name: Good Tidings Air Slash
syncMove.description: This move’s power increases if the target is affected by a status condition.

passives.name: Super Interference 1
passives.description: Raises the chance of inflicting status conditions—as well as inflicting the flinching, confused, or trapped condition—with the additional effects of moves.

passives.name: Foul Fighting 5
passives.description: Powers up moves when the move’s target or targets are flinching, confused, or trapped.
